lead_paragraph: FOGELMAN--Roger Harry, beloved brother, brother-in- law, uncle, cousin, and friend, poet and student of language, on January 26th, shortly before his 76th birthday. Born and raised in the Bronx, educated at Cornell (BA) and the University of Virginia (Ph.D.). He died peacefully at the Jamaica Hospital Hospice. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  FOGELMAN, ROGER HARRY
